news_header: Users actively commented on the voting bill's progress on Trump's social media platform, celebrating Republican victories and discussing voter turnout.
news_text: On Trump's social media platform, users expressed their excitement over the voting bill's progress, particularly celebrating Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump's predicted victory. The platform, which has around 2 million active users, features posts referred to as 'truths.' Despite Trump's return to Twitter (now X), he continues to engage with followers on his platform, which he founded after being banned from major social media sites in 2021. The platform is owned by Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.
